history.heading: Equipment designed for plasma doping, having all of the following:
history.title: Equipment designed for plasma doping, having all of the following:

supplement.heading: Supplement No. 1 to Part 774—The Commerce Control List

breadcrumbs: B. “Test”, “Inspection” and “Production Equipment”
3B993 Specified semiconductor manufacturing equipment as follows (see list of items controls).
Semiconductor wafer fabrication equipment for 300 mm wafers designed for ion implantation and having any of the following:
history.text:
Equipment designed for plasma doping, having all of the following:
One or more Radio Frequency (RF) power source(s);
b.1.a. One or more Radio Frequency (RF) power source(s);
One or more pulsed DC Power Source; and
b.1.b. One or more pulsed DC Power Source; and
One or more n-type or p-type dopant implants.
b.1.c. One or more n-type or p-type dopant implants.
